text: Rodney Olav Riise (21 December 1942 - 31 December 2009) was a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo, Norway and represented the club Vålerengens IF. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in Grenoble in 1968, where the Norwegian team placed 11th. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Rodney Riise
